title: <Content> tag disappearing stuff using NativeBase for ReactNative
body:
I don't understand why <Content></Content> tag is not rendering out stuff I am adding between these tags, using NativeBase for ReactNative project. I have consulted with the NativeBase documentations and followed along but no luck yet.

--------index.ios.js--------

    import React, { Component } from 'react';
    import {
      AppRegistry,
      StyleSheet,
      Text,
      View
    } from 'react-native';

    import AppHeader from './src/components/AppHeader';
    import AppBody from './src/components/AppBody';
    import AppFooter from './src/components/AppFooter';

            export default class VanForYou extends Component {
              render() {
                return (
          <View>
            <AppHeader/>
            <AppBody/>
            <AppFooter/>
          </View>
        );
      }
    }


    AppRegistry.registerComponent('VanForYou', () => VanForYou);

--------AppHeader.js--------

    import React, {Component} from 'react';
    import {Text} from 'react-native';
    import {
      Header,
      Left,
      Button,
      Body,
      Right,
      Icon,
      Title
    } from 'native-base';
    export default class AppHeader extends Component {
      render() {
        return (
          <Header>
            <Left>
              <Button transparent>
                <Icon name='arrow-back'/>
              </Button>
            </Left>
            <Body>
              <Title>VanForYou</Title>
            </Body>
            <Right>
              <Button transparent>
                <Icon name='menu'/>
              </Button>
            </Right>
          </Header>
        );
      }
    }
    module.export = AppHeader;

--------AppBody.js--------

    import React, {Component} from 'react';
    import {Text, View, StyleSheet, Image} from 'react-native';
    import {
      Content,
      Container,
      Card,
      CardItem,
      Left,
      Thumbnail,
      Body,
      Button,
      Icon
    } from 'native-base';

    export default class AppBody extends Component {
      render() {
        return (

            <Content>
              <Card style={{
                flex: 0
              }}>
                <CardItem>
                  <Left>
                    <Thumbnail source={require('../images/about.png')}/>
                    <Body>
                      <Text>NativeBase</Text>
                      <Text note>April 15, 2016</Text>
                    </Body>
                  </Left>
                </CardItem>
                <CardItem>
                  <Body>
                    <Image style={{
              resizeMode: 'cover'
                    }} source={require('../images/about-selected.png')}/>
                    <Text>
              At Van For You in #UK, we provide an #extensive range of #clearance, #removals, #storage and #packing services. Our range of services are; Professional #removals, Domestic #clearance, #Commercial #clearance, #Storage (long and short), Specialist #packing, #Airport #luggage trips, Man and van services.
            </Text>
                    <Button transparent textStyle={{
              color: '#87838B'
            }}>
                      <Icon name="logo-github"/>
                      <Text>1,926 stars</Text>
                    </Button>
                  </Body>
                </CardItem>
              </Card>
            </Content>

        );
      }
    }

    const styles = StyleSheet.create({
      bodyText: {
        justifyContent: 'center',
        alignItems: 'center',
        backgroundColor: '#F5FCFF'
      }
    });

    module.export = AppBody;

--------AppFooter.js--------

    import React, {Component} from 'react';
    import {Text} from 'react-native';
    import {Footer, FooterTab, Button, Icon, Container} from 'native-base';

    export default class AppFooter extends Component {
      render() {
        return (
          <Container>
            <Footer>
              <FooterTab>
                <Button vertical active>
                  <Icon active name="home"/>
                  <Text>Home</Text>
                </Button>
                <Button vertical>
                  <Icon name="home"/>
                  <Text>Services</Text>
                </Button>
                <Button vertical>
                  <Icon name="home"/>
                  <Text>Pricings</Text>
                </Button>
                <Button vertical>
                  <Icon name="contact"/>
                  <Text>Contact</Text>
                </Button>
              </FooterTab>
            </Footer>
          </Container>

        );
      }
    }

    module.export = AppFooter;
